author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
The formatting code currently adds newlines unnecessarily so you get double and sometimes triple newlines that just take up screen space.  Affects all output types.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
Get-Module
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none

ModuleType Version    Name                                ExportedCommands
---------- -------    ----                                ----------------
Script     0.0        build                               {Clear-PSRepo, Compress-TestContent, Convert-TxtResourceToXml, ConvertFrom-PesterLog...}
Manifest   3.1.0.0    Microsoft.PowerShell.Management     {Add-Content, Clear-Content, Clear-Item, Clear-ItemProperty...}
Manifest   3.1.0.0    Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility        {Add-Member, Add-Type, Clear-Variable, Compare-Object...}
Script     2.0.0      PSReadLine                          {Get-PSReadLineKeyHandler, Get-PSReadLineOption, Remove-PSReadLineKeyHandler, Set-PSReadLineKeyHandler...}

PS /Users/steve/repos/PowerShell>
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none

ModuleType Version    Name                                ExportedCommands
---------- -------    ----                                ----------------
Script     0.0        build                               {Clear-PSRepo, Compress-TestContent, Convert-TxtResourceToXml, ConvertFrom-PesterLog...}
Manifest   3.1.0.0    Microsoft.PowerShell.Management     {Add-Content, Clear-Content, Clear-Item, Clear-ItemProperty...}
Manifest   3.1.0.0    Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility        {Add-Member, Add-Type, Clear-Variable, Compare-Object...}
Script     2.0.0      PSReadLine                          {Get-PSReadLineKeyHandler, Get-PSReadLineOption, Remove-PSReadLineKeyHandler, Set-PSReadLineKeyHandler...}


PS /Users/steve/repos/PowerShell>
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0-preview.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.1.0-preview.3
OS                             Darwin 17.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 17.6.0: Tue May  8 15:22:16 PDT 2018; root:xnu-4570.61.1~1/RELEASE_X86_64
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Remove unnecessary newlines from output
